articles.title: Bitcoin Price Jumps to $115,000 As Analyst Says It May Never Fall Below $100K Again
articles.author: Bitcoin Magazine
articles.summary: Bitcoin price surged to $115,000 on Monday, rising more than 1% in 24 hours due to optimism over easing U.S.-China trade tensions and renewed investor appetite for risk assets. According to Geoffrey Kendrick, Head of Digital Asset Research at Standard Chartered Bank, Bitcoin price may never fall below $100,000 again.

articles.title: Trump Family's American Bitcoin Gains 10% With Fresh BTC Purchases
articles.author: Bit RSS
articles.summary: The Trump family's firm, American Bitcoin, has amassed nearly $4.5 billion in Bitcoin and seen its stock soar 20% this week. New purchases and the 'Trump Bump' have driven the stock up by 10% so far this week, according to reports.

articles.title: Republican senator warns time is running out to pass US crypto bill: Report
articles.author: Bit RSS
articles.summary: There is a US government shutdown with no end in sight. Congress has until January or February to pass crypto legislation, according to a Republican lawmaker. The bill will need to be passed before the end of the current government shutdown.    i.e. it will have to be approved before the government shutdown ends.

It highlights a fascinating shift in investment patterns in the digital asset market and draws attention to the topic.

articles.summary: On Oct. 27, Etherum broke past $4,200 and has since surged by 7.12%. The token has been on an upward trend since then. It is currently trading at $4.2300.    i.e. up 7% on the previous day.

articles.title: BIP-444: The Soft Fork Proposal Aiming to Restrict Arbitrary Data Sparks Fierce Debate in Bitcoin Community
articles.author: 99 Bitcoins
articles.summary: A newly surfaced Bitcoin Improvement Proposal, BIP-444, has ignited one of the most intense governance debates in the Bitcoin ecosystem since the block size wars. It aims to restrict the inclusion of arbitrary data in Bitcoin transactions through a one-year soft fork.

articles.title: Bitcoin Developers Clash Over Soft Fork Proposal To Combat ‘Spam'
articles.author: Bitcoinist
articles.summary: A fresh soft-fork concept billed as a temporary fix for non-monetary data on Bitcoin has ignited one of the sharpest developer rows since the blocksize wars. Critics decry the move as censorship theater and an attempt to force changes under the specter of legal liability.

articles.title: ASTER dips 12% as Aster DEX announces stricter VIP tier requirements

articles.summary: Aster's VIP Program will make native ASTER ownership the primary factor in determining VIP status requirements starting on November 3. Aster is a popular decentralized exchange trading in the crypto-currencies. It's one of the most popular exchanges in the world today.

articles.title: Heather Morgan Thanks Trump After Early Prison Release
articles.author: Crypto Economy
articles.summary: Heather Morgan, also known as Razzlekhan, expressed her gratitude to former U.S. President Donald Trump on X after securing an early release from prison. Morgan was convicted for her role in laundering billions in Bitcoin stolen from Bitfinex.

articles.title: Grant County detectives recover $700K in stolen bitcoin machines
articles.author: Chris Essex
articles.summary: Grant County detectives have recovered a large haul of high-tech equipment from a Bitcoin mining operation and stopped an attempted theft of $75,000 worth of frozen turkeys in the same investigation. No arrests have been made in connection with the case. The investigation is ongoing.
